title: Target Group

toast.create_and_activate_success: Target group created and activated successfully
toast.update_and_activate_success: Target group updated and activated successfully
toast.change_status_failed: Failed to change target group status

from_to_age: {{fromYear}} Year(s) {{fromMonth}} Month(s) {{fromDay}} Day(s) - {{toYear}} Year(s) {{toMonth}} Month(s) {{toDay}} Day(s)

validation.month_max: Month cannot be more than 11, if you want to enter 12, just enter 1 year.
validation.day_max: Day cannot be more than 29, if you want to enter 30 or 31, just enter 1 month.
validation.cannot_greater_than_to: Age From cannot be greater than Age To

confirmation_activation.description: Are you sure you want to {{status}} this?
confirmation_activation.subdescription_activate: This target group will appear and be able to use.
confirmation_activation.description_deactivate: This target group will not appear and be able to use.

confirmation_deletion.description: Are you sure you want to delete this target group?
